bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with blood spitting because of a heated lung that has resulted from drinking wine and an excessive consumption of hot, spicy food. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 27: 吐血有三 種…二曰肺疽…肺疽者，言飲酒之後，毒滿便吐 , “There are three types of blood-spitting. ...Second: lung impediment - illness . ...[Blood-spitting because of] lung impediment - illnesses , that is to say: after one has drunk wine he is filled with poison and vomits [blood]”.
